items.title: Stock Market LIVE updates: GIFT Nifty signals weak global cues to weigh on Sensex, Nifty at open
items.description: Stock Market LIVE updates: Indian markets were likely to start on a muted note on Wednesday, driven by the cautious mood in global markets, ahead of US consumer inflation figures.

items.title: Chandan Taparia of MOFSL recommends buying these stock on September 11
items.description: PI Industries is in a strong uptrend and holding the gains at higher zones.

items.title: Gold trading strategy today: Resistance at $2,550; Support at $2,446
items.description: Spot gold was trading with a gain of around 0.20 per cent at $2514 at the time of the MCX closing. The MCX October gold contract at Rs 71,903 (LTP) was up 0.38 per cent.

items.title: Stocks To Watch: SpiceJet, Maruti Suzuki, Reliance, M&M, Lemon Tree
items.description: SpiceJet has reached a deal with Carlyle Group's commercial aviation unit to write off a $40.2 million payment obligation and a $30 million conversion of arrears into equity.

items.title: Here's how to trade Nifty Bank, Private Bank today; key levels here
items.description: The Nifty Bank Index is currently range-bound between the levels of 51,375 and 51,175. A breakout or breakdown from this range will likely trigger momentum in the respective direction.

items.title: Bajaj Housing Finance Rs 6,560 crore IPO booked 7.50 times on day 2
items.description: The initial share sale got bids for 5,45,85,77,822 shares against 72,75,75,756 shares on offer, as per NSE data

items.title: Market today: Oil below $70, US Prez debate, Bajaj Housing IPO last day
items.description: Share market today: Market participants today will analyse the ongoing US presidential debate. They will also focus on US inflation report, oil prices, and IPOs back home

items.title: Dividend, Buyback, Stock-split: 15 stocks go ex-date today; do you own any?
items.description: Synergy Green Industries, Insecticides (India), and Andhra Paper will trade ex-date today for their rights issue, share buyback, and sub-division, respectively

items.title: Bajaj Housing IPO GMP rockets 100% on last day; should you park your funds?
items.description: Bajaj Housing Finance IPO, which ends today, has so far received an overwhelming response from investors, with the public issue being subscribed 7.50 times by the second day of subscription

items.title: Lemon Tree Hotels share price rises 3% on signing new property in Mumbai
items.description: The rise in Lemon Tree Hotels share price came after the company announced that it has signed a new property in Mumbai.

items.title: F&O Insights: Will Bank Nifty see short-covering? Check key levels here
items.description: Derivatives market update for Sept 11: Bank Nifty weekly options PCR stands at 0.9:1; key trigger point at 51,550. Premium in Bank Nifty futures down to 99 pts from 255 pts in just 3 trading sessions.

items.title: Tata Motors shares slip 4% after UBS maintains 'Sell' with target of Rs 825
items.description: The foreign brokerage expect further downside risk from margin slippage at JLR and within Indian PVs (especially the EV arm) on any significant shortfall in performance due to high valuations.

items.title: Silver trading strategy today: Buying on dips suggested; Resistance at $30
items.description: Spot silver was steady around $28.30 at the time of the MCX closing. The MCX December silver contract at Rs 73,700 was up around 0.07 per cent.

items.title: Inox India shares gain 5% on securing patent rights for cold storage unit
items.description: The uptick in Inox India share price came after the company announced that it has received patent rights from the Patents office, Government of India.

items.title: Gensol Engg to set up India's first green hydrogen plant in JV; stock up 3%
items.description: Gensol Engineering share price gained up to 2.87 per cent at Rs 935 per share on the BSE in Wednesday's intraday deals

items.title: Premier Explosives hits 5% upper limit on inking deal with Astra Microwave
items.description: The uptick in Premier Explosives share price came after the company announced that it has inked a memorandum of understanding (MoU) with Astra Microwave to develop and sell multiple products jointly.

items.title: Hindenburg questions Sebi chief Madhabi Buch's silence amid Congress claims
items.description: The Congress party levelled fresh allegations against Sebi chairperson Madhabi Buch and her husband, accusing her of 'wilful ignorance' when faced with a conflict of interest

items.title: Hedging against volatility in NSE Nifty Bank Index suddenly looks cheap
items.description: Indian bank stocks have lagged the broader market, with sluggish deposit growth raising concerns that more regulation may be coming

items.title: Ramco Systems shares rally 6% on launching 'Aviation Software 6.0'; details
items.description: Ramco Systems share price gained up to 5.93 per cent at Rs 429.50 per share on the BSE in Wednesday's intraday deals

items.title: Zomato rallies 5% to hit record high; stock has zoomed 127% so far this yr
items.description: Last week, JP Morgan maintained an overweight rating on Zomato, with a target price of Rs 340 per share.

items.title: As PSBs put Voda Idea loan on hold, will the stock drop below Rs 10?
items.description: Technical outlook on Vodafone Idea: The stock is trading with a weak bias below its 200-DMA after a gap of 14 months; it needs to break above Rs 15.40 for the sentiment to revive, suggests chart.

items.title: Century Textiles hits record high after buying Rs 1,100-cr land in Mumbai
items.description: Century Textiles and Industries Limited has acquired the ownership rights of the 10-acre land parcel in Worli, Mumbai for Rs 1,100 crore

items.title: Countdown begins: Kross, Tolins Tyres IPOs end today; should you bid?
items.description: The grey market premium (GMP) for both IPOs has remained upbeat, reflecting favorable market sentiments for these public issues

items.title: Rajoo Engineers share price hits 5% upper circuit on securing $15 mn order
items.description: The uptick in Rajoo Engineers share price came after the company announced that it has signed a deal with an internatola entity to develop innovative plastic extrusion machinery for worth $15 million.

items.title: Jubilant Pharmova hits all time high on receiving 'VAI' tag for US facility
items.description: Jubilant Pharmova share price rose as much as 4.2 per cent, touching its all time high at Rs 1060.15 per share on the BSE in early hours of Wednesday's intraday deals

items.title: Oil India, ONGC dip up to 6% as crude oil prices fall on demand concerns
items.description: While upstream earnings are currently impacted, with the OPEC+ delaying its planned rise in production, analysts at Prabhudas Lilladher expect oil prices to rebound to $75-80 per barrel soon.

items.title: Govt proposes to give brokers more freedom to invest surplus cash
items.description: Amendment to SCRA to allow brokers venture into other businesses as long as client funds are protected

items.title: IndiGo, CEAT: Which stocks are on analysts' radar as oil falls below $70?
items.description: Brent crude price today: Analysts prefer aviation and tyre stocks among the lot, but remain cautious on paints and oil marketing companies

items.title: Samvardhana, Suprajit Engg, Goodluck shares slip as BMW cuts FY24 guidance
items.description: Shares of domestic auto component suppliers took a beating on Wednesday after Germany-based automaker BMW cut its Ebit margin and RoCE guidance due to escalating recall costs and delivery stops

items.title: Eureka Forbes lists on National Stock Exchange; share price gains over 3%
items.description: Shares of Eureka Forbes rose after the company announced the listing of its shares on the National Stock Exchange (NSE).

items.title: Ashish Kacholia portfolio: Zaggle soars 14% on heavy volumes, hits new high
items.description: Ace investor Ashish Kacholia held 2.90 million equity shares or 2.37 per cent stake in Zaggle at the end of the June 2024 quarter, shareholding pattern data shows

items.title: PN Gadgil Jewellers IPO draws strong demand; GMP jumps 54% on Day 2
items.description: The subscription window for PN Gadgil Jewellers IPO, which is available at a price band of Rs 456-480 with a lot size of 44 shares, will close on September 12, 2024

items.title: Varun Beverages shares rise over 4% ahead of stock split record date
items.description: The Board of directors fixed Thursday, September 12, 2024, as the 'Record Date' for sub-division / split of existing equity shares of the company

items.title: Have FPIs implicated in Adani case revealed details of their owners: Cong
items.description: Sebi Chairman Buch and her husband have denied the allegations levelled against them as baseless and asserted that their finances are an open book

items.title: R Systems to merge Velotio, Scaleworx with itself; stock gains over 3%
items.description: The uptick in the stock price came following the company's announcement that its board of directors has approved the amalgamation of Velotio Technologies and Scaleworx Technologies with R Systems

items.title: BCPL Railway Infrastructure at 5% upper circuit on Rs 71-cr order; details
items.description: The uptick in BCPL Railway Infrastructure shares came after the company announced that it has received an order worth Rs 71 crore.

items.title: JSW Infra extends rally, up 7% on capex Plans; BNP Paribas raises target
items.description: Shares of JSW Infrastructure zoomed 6.92 per cent at Rs 338 per share on the BSE in Wednesday's intraday deals

items.title: This T-group media stock is locked in upper circuit for 111th straight day
items.description: Sri Adhikari Brothers Television Network stock was relisted in April 2024 post share capital reduction; the stock has since zoomed 1,539 per cent or 16.4-fold till date.

items.title: CEAT commences commercial production at Tamil Nadu plant; stock up 2%
items.description: The installed capacity of the plant is expected to progressively reach 1,500 tyres per day in the next 12 months

items.title: Prism Johnson zooms over 40% in 2 days, hits record high on heavy volumes
items.description: Till 1:24 PM, average trading volume on the counter jumped nearly 10-fold today with nearly 78.55 million equity shares, representing 15.6 per cent of total equity of Prism Johnson, changing hands
